name: UEVision
tag_list: user-experience, ui-design, usability, interaction-design, information-architecture, ux-design, ux-strategy
overview:
UEVision designs and delivers the perfect product user experience.

UEVision is the only user experience design company with the breadth of expertise to deliver cutting-edge business, enterprise, and consumer product user experiences. UEVision’s services include user experience strategy, product concepting and prototyping, UI design, branding and visual design, and user testing and validation.

UEVision’s customers have typically experienced higher profitability on their product launches and the ROI on UI investment typically is up 1000%. Their clients have included Oracle, Fujitsu, Blue Shield of California, LeapFrog Enterprises, E*TRADE Financial, SugarCRM, Taleo, Groupon, Visa, and Saba Software, as well as many small and mid-sized companies.

external_links.title: Podcast: Interview with UEVision CEO, Sarah  Kling
